name: Wanted: Dead or Alive (itch)
description:
Find the wanted person and shoot or arrest them!

Controls:

There is only one button in the lower right to change between your gun and cuffs.

This is my first finished game. It is not much, but I hope it will entertain You. Even if it is just for a little while ;)

If you have any comments or opinions, please let me know.

Thanks to Kenny for providing awesome assets. They make up everything you can see, except for UI elements.
